gw.api.domain.invoice

Class ShiftedDateSequence

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.domain.invoice.DateSequence
      • gw.api.domain.invoice.ShiftedDateSequence

  • public class ShiftedDateSequence
extends DateSequence
    A ShiftedDateSequence decorates another DateSequence to shift the dates later by the specified number of days. To shift earlier, use a negative number of days.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShiftedDateSequence(DateSequence underlyingDateSequence, int shiftLaterByDays)

      • datesInInterval

        public java.util.SortedSet<org.joda.time.DateTime> datesInInterval(org.joda.time.Interval dateInterval)
        Description copied from class: DateSequence

        Specified by:
        datesInInterval in class DateSequence
        Parameters:
        dateInterval - the interval to use (inclusive on start, exclusive on the end)
        Returns:
